The claim originated from a website call: org, which is part of a troll network and has a history of publishing fake news stories.
Facebook users flagged the content as po: indicating that it was questioned by users and identified as potentially fake news.
The claim mixed real details: such as Aldean's performance on Saturday Night Live and his tribute to Tom Petty, with entirely fictional ones, including false statements made by Aldean about gun control and the NRA.
The claim falsely stated that Aldean: s concert in Birmingham, Alabama was canceled due to his supposed anti-gun statements, when in reality, the concert was scheduled for a different date (August 10th) and there is no evidence to support the claim that it was canceled.
